definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: Would you tell us your best prices C.I.F. Humburg for the chairs.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉你方椅子到汉堡到岸价的最低价格。

sentences.english: I'd love to HAs ywe lowest quotations, C. I. F. Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 请报温哥华到岸价的很低价格。

sentences.english: I'd like to hxdye your lowest quotations, C. I. F. Rotterdam.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你们报鹿特丹到岸价的最低价格。

sentences.english: Here is our offer, 300 Euro per ton, CIF Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 我们的报盘，每吨300欧元新加坡到岸价。

sentences.english: I'd like to have your lowest quotations, C. I. F. Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 请报温哥华到岸价的最低价钱。

sentences.english: 5，When can I have your firm C.I.F. prices, Mr. Li?
sentences.chinese: 李先生，什么时候能得到你们到岸价的实盘？

sentences.english: Pleas make us as offer on CIF Hong Kong basis for handmade leather gloves.
sentences.chinese: 请报手工制作的皮手套香港到岸价。

sentences.english: It's C. I. F. , and therefore the insurance premium should be borne by your side.
sentences.chinese: 我们付的是到岸价，所以保险费由贵方负担。

sentences.english: We generally insure W. P. A. on C. I. F. sales.
sentences.chinese: 按到岸价交易，我们一般保水渍险。

sentences.english: I suggest a 4 percent reduction on the C. I. F. price you first quoted.
sentences.chinese: 我建议在你方次报的到岸价的基础上降价4%。

sentences.english: A:Then would you please make your prices CIF including five percent?
sentences.chinese: 那你能报包括百分之五佣金在内的到岸价吗？

sentences.english: Would you tell us your best prices C. I. F. Hamberg for the chairs.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉你方椅子到汉堡到岸价的非常低价格。

sentences.english: I suggest a 4 percent reduction on the C.I.F. price you first quoted.
sentences.chinese: 我建议在你方第一次报的到岸价的基础上降价4%。

sentences.english: I'd like to hear your lowest quotations C. I. F. Seattle.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你报一下西雅图到岸价的最低报价。

sentences.english: I'd like to have your lowest quotations, C. I. F. Rotterdam.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你们报鹿特丹到岸价的最低价钱。

sentences.chinese: 我想请你们报鹿特丹到岸价的最低价格。

definition: general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
